title: Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette - Fresh and Spicy Men's Fragrance - 100ml
description: Experience the bold and invigorating scent of Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette. This fresh and spicy fragrance for men features a dynamic blend of bergamot, Sichuan pepper, and Ambroxan. Launched in 2015, Sauvage captures the essence of the wild outdoors with its crisp citrus top notes, spicy heart, and warm, woody base. Perfect for confident men who seek a modern and rugged fragrance for any occasion. The 100ml bottle is ideal for daily wear or special events, offering a sophisticated and lasting scent experience.
key_features: Fresh and spicy fragrance with bergamot, pepper, and Ambroxan
Bold and invigorating scent capturing the spirit of the wild
Ideal for confident men seeking a modern, rugged fragrance
Suitable for any occasion, with a long-lasting and sophisticated aroma

title: Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette - Fresh and Spicy Men's Fragrance - 50ml
